direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve price-related information for symbols, but ticker24H provides 24-hour statistics while tickerSymbol provides the latest price.
Both methods provide ticker information, but bookTicker focuses on the best price/qty on the order book.
Both methods handle similar parameter checks and use the same requestHandler for sending public requests.
Both methods provide price change statistics, but tradingDayTicker focuses on a trading day.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the requestHandler for sending API requests.
Both methods perform parameter checks to ensure valid inputs before making API requests.
Both methods need to verify the API response for correctness and handle any exceptions that may arise.
